query.nsql: SELECT @SELECT:DIM:USER_DEF:IMPLIED:CODES:INITIALIZED:INITIALIZED@ FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN count(*)=40 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END INITIALIZED FROM CMN_GG_NSQL_QUERIES WHERE QUERY_CODE IN ( 'capture3c.get_all_custom_object_instance_codes', 'capture3c.get_all_entity_codes', 'capture3c.get_all_group_codes', 'capture3c.get_all_job_codes', 'capture3c.get_all_lookup_codes', 'capture3c.get_all_matrix_codes', 'capture3c.get_all_object_codes', 'capture3c.get_all_obs_codes', 'capture3c.get_all_page_codes', 'capture3c.get_all_partition_model_codes', 'capture3c.get_all_portlet_codes', 'capture3c.get_all_process_codes', 'capture3c.get_all_project_codes', 'capture3c.get_all_query_codes', 'capture3c.get_all_transclass', 'capture3c.get_all_chargecode', 'capture3c.get_all_invclass', 'capture3c.get_all_wipclass', 'capture3c.get_all_companyclass', 'capture3c.get_all_resourceclass', 'capture3c.get_all_costpluscodes', 'capture3c.get_all_gl_accounts', 'capture3c.get_all_gl_accounts', 'capture3c.get_all_inputtypecodes', 'capture3c.get_all_notification', 'capture3c.get_all_menus', 'capture3c.get_all_users', 'capture3c.get_all_resources', 'capture3c.get_all_ui_themes', 'capture3c.get_all_vendors', 'capture3c.get_all_companies', 'capture3c.get_all_roles', 'capture3c.get_all_time_slices', 'capture3c.get_time_slice', 'capture3c.get_all_project_settings', 'capture3c.get_project_setting', 'capture3c.get_all_system_settings', 'capture3c.get_system_setting', 'capture3c.get_all_departments', 'capture3c.get_all_locations', 'capture3c.get_all_object_view_codes' ) ) i WHERE @FILTER@
